problem.markdown:
>>Enter the approximate value of 502*9:<< = 4518 +- 15%
>>Enter the number of fingers on a human hand<< = 5
[explanation] Although you can get an exact value by typing 502*9 into a calculator, the result will be close to 500*10, or 5,000. The grader accepts any response within 15% of the true value, 4518, so that you can use any estimation technique that you like.
If you look at your hand, you can count that you have five fingers. [explanation]
